summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 24.08.050, 24.42.050, 24.44.080, 24.44.090, 24.46.070, 24.46.100, 24.48.060, 24.48.070, 24.50.080, and 24.54.030 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Zoning Ordinance 86300, Sections 3.05, 14A.4, 15.3, 15.41, 16.3, 16.52, 17.3, 17.41, 17A.41 and 19.21) to define and provide for drive-in banks as a principal or accessory use in various zone classifications.
